00029 XGraphListConnector::XGraphListConnector(const shared_ptr<XGraphList> &node, QTable *item,
00030                                          QPushButton *btnnew, QPushButton *btndelete) :
00031     XListQConnector(node, item),
00032     m_graphlist(node),
00033     m_newGraph(createOrphan<XNode>("NewGraph", true)),
00034     m_deleteGraph(createOrphan<XNode>("DeleteGraph", true)),
00035     m_conNewGraph(xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_newGraph, btnnew)),
00036     m_conDeleteGraph(xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_deleteGraph, btndelete))
00037 {
00038     btnnew->setIconSet( KApplication::kApplication()->iconLoader()->loadIconSet("filenew", 
00039                                                                                 KIcon::Toolbar, KIcon::SizeSmall, true ) );  
00040     btndelete->setIconSet( KApplication::kApplication()->iconLoader()->loadIconSet("fileclose", 
00041                                                                                    KIcon::Toolbar, KIcon::SizeSmall, true ) ); 
00042                
00043     connect(item, SIGNAL( clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )),
00044             this, SLOT(clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )) );
00045     m_pItem->setNumCols(4);
00046     const double def = 50;
00047     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(0, (int)(def * 2.0));
00048     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(1, (int)(def * 2.0));
00049     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(2, (int)(def * 2.0));
00050     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(3, (int)(def * 2.0));
00051     QStringList labels;
00052     labels += KAME::i18n("Name");
00053     labels += KAME::i18n("Axis X");
00054     labels += KAME::i18n("Axis Y");
00055     labels += KAME::i18n("Axis Z");
00056     m_pItem->setColumnLabels(labels);
00057 
00058     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(node->children());
00059     if(list) {  
00060         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++)
00061             onCatch(*it);
00062     }
00063 
00064   
00065     m_lsnNewGraph = m_newGraph->onTouch().connectWeak(
00066         shared_from_this(), &XGraphListConnector::onNewGraph, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00067     m_lsnDeleteGraph = m_deleteGraph->onTouch().connectWeak(
00068         shared_from_this(), &XGraphListConnector::onDeleteGraph, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void
00072 XGraphListConnector::onNewGraph (const shared_ptr<XNode> &) {
00073     static int graphidx = 1;
00074     m_graphlist->createByTypename("", std::string(QString().sprintf("Graph-%d", graphidx++).utf8()));
00075 }
00076 void
00077 XGraphListConnector::onDeleteGraph (const shared_ptr<XNode> &) {
00078     int n = m_pItem->currentRow();
00079     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_graphlist->children());
00080     if(list) {    
00081         if((n >= 0) && (n < (int)list->size())) {
00082             shared_ptr<XNode> node = list->at(n);
00083             m_graphlist->releaseChild(node);
00084         }
00085     }
00086 }
00087 void
00088 XGraphListConnector::clicked ( int row, int col, int, const QPoint& ) {
00089     switch(col) {
00090     case 0:
00091     {
00092         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_graphlist->children());
00093         if(list) { 
00094             if((row >= 0) && (row < (int)list->size())) {
00095                 dynamic_pointer_cast<XValGraph>(list->at(row))->showGraph();
00096             }
00097         }
00098     }
00099     break;
00100     default:
00101         break;
00102     }
00103 }
00104 void
00105 XGraphListConnector::onRelease(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00106 {
00107     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end();)
00108     {
00109         if(it->node == node)
00110         {
00111             for(int i = 0; i < m_pItem->numRows(); i++)
00112             {
00113                 if(m_pItem->cellWidget(i, 1) == it->widget) m_pItem->removeRow(i);
00114             }
00115             it = m_cons.erase(it);
00116         }
00117         else
00118         {
00119             it++;
00120         }
00121     }
00122 }
00123 void
00124 XGraphListConnector::onCatch(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00125 {
00126     shared_ptr<XValGraph> graph = dynamic_pointer_cast<XValGraph>(node);
00127     int i = m_pItem->numRows();
00128     m_pItem->insertRows(i);
00129     m_pItem->setText(i, 0, graph->getLabel());
00130 
00131     struct tcons con;
00132     con.node = node;
00133     QComboBox *cmbX = new QComboBox(m_pItem);
00134     con.conx = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(graph->axisX(), cmbX);
00135     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 1, cmbX);
00136     QComboBox *cmbY1 = new QComboBox(m_pItem);
00137     con.cony1 = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(graph->axisY1(), cmbY1);
00138     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 2, cmbY1);
00139     QComboBox *cmbZ = new QComboBox(m_pItem);
00140     con.conz = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(graph->axisZ(), cmbZ);
00141     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 3, cmbZ);
00142 
00143     con.widget = m_pItem->cellWidget(i, 1);
00144     m_cons.push_back(con);
00145 }
